data.title: Top 15 Banquet Halls Near Moti Nagar & Kirti Nagar, Delhi
data.meta_description: Top 15 Banquet Halls Near Moti Nagar & Kirti Nagar with Price & Menu, 1. Grand Affairs Banquet, 2. Rain Tree Banquet, 3. Orabella Banquets
data.text:
Weddings in Delhi don’t need any introduction as everyone knows that Delhi weddings and that too in Moti Nagar and Kirti Nagar are the most lavish and grand and nothing can beat them. There are plenty of options available for banquet halls in Delhi that can help you in planning an elaborative and distinguished wedding. These halls have all kinds of services available and can be varied as per your requirement and the event.

So, finding the one that perfectly matches your envision, location, and most importantly budget is such a daunting task. Also, you need to look at certain things when choosing a banquet hall like the ambiance of the venue should be matched with your wedding theme, have enough parking space, easy access, offering customized services, and more. To make it a bit easy, here we have listed some top banquet halls in Delhi for weddings that are located near Moti and Kirti Nagar and are the right in every sense for your big day.

Grand Affairs Banquet

Grand Affairs Banquet is the perfect combination of modernity and tradition located at Kirti Nagar Industrial Area in Delhi. The lavish décor and a great ambiance can make feel your guest relaxed and delighted.

Capacity: Their well-equipped hall can accommodate up to 400 guests. Hall 1 has a capacity of 250 and 125 people in seating. Hall 2 can hold around 200 guests and with 125 guests in seating.

Price per plate: The cost is 600/pax for veg and700/pax for non-veg.

Amenities: In-house catering and décor, Basic lighting, electricity & backup.

“Click Here” to “Read More”: Hindu Marriage Dates in 2023

Rain Tree Banquet

Rain Tree Banquet, located just near Moti Nagar Railway Station, is the perfect venue for hosting mid-sized events at the most affordable prices. The superb-looking interior and architecture are blended with the luxurious wall panels, grandeur chandeliers, warm lights, and designer seating arrangements that can leave your guests a bit staggering.

Capacity: Their grand hall can accommodate up to 150 seating and 400 floating guests.

Price per plate: The cost is 700/pax for veg and 800/pax for non-veg.

Amenities: basic lighting, valet parking, bridal room, parking area air-conditioned hall, and electricity & backup.

Orabella Banquets

Orabella Banquets with mesmerizing ambiance, beautiful interiors that has included a European touch with a traditional theme, amazing décor, and world-class services can turn your wedding dream into a reality.

Capacity: They have 2 event spaces that can gather up to 400 to 800 people at once. On the ground floor- 500 floating people and 300 in seating, and on the first floor- 600 floating people and 350 seating.

Price per plate: The banquets in-house cater to serve you all types of multi cuisines food like North Indian, South Indian, Oriental, Indian street food, Chinese, Mughlai, and much more. The approx. cost is 1400/ pax.

Amenities: In-house décor service, in-house catering, bridal rooms, valet parking, hospitable staff, electricity backup, sound/music, and various event spaces.

“Click Here” to “Read More“: How To Choose The Perfect Wedding Venue

Sawan Banquets

Sawan Banquets is one of the ideal wedding halls in Moti Nagar which is just near Jhilmil Metro Station. With elegant and sophisticated-looking decoration, reflective panels, and excellent services the venue can create a world of comfortable luxury, and glamour that will have a charming effect on the whole event.

Capacity: The well-equipped hall can accommodate around 00 guests. Their one hall namely, Daffodil can host 400 people at a time, the second is Sapphire which can gather around 250 people, and the last is Medallion which can accommodate 300 people at a time

Price per plate: The cost is 1000/pax and includes 100% pure vegetarian food.

Amenities: Parking area with the convenience of valet service, bridal room, and in-house catering.

Invitee Banquet

If you are looking for a great ambiance and excellent customized hospitality then pick Invitee Banquets which will create a magical journey of function. The interior included peachy golden-toned hues and was lit with dazzling lighting fixtures. The venue is perfect for small to medium-sized gatherings for your big day.

Capacity: Their basement and first-floor banquet hall holds 250 people, and the ground-floor banquet hall can accommodate 100 people.

Price per plate: The average cost is 1200/pax for veg and 1500/pax for non-veg.

Amenities: parking space basic lighting, electricity, dance floor, a dance floor,

RK Banquet

Another wedding venue in Kirti Nagar is RK Banquet which is beyond your expectations and demand. The venue is known for non-compromising standards, hygiene, service, top-quality food, hospitality, and innovative interior by Dubai and Mumbai artists. They can make your grand day a lifetime memorable gala affair.

Capacity: They have multiple party areas from which Hall 1 has a capacity of 250 guests in seating and 400 guests in floating, Hall 2 can hold up to 250 guests in seating and 400 guests in floating, hall 3 can gather up to 100 guests in seating and 150 guests in floating, and Hall 4 has the capacity of 100 guests and up to 50 guests in seating arrangements.

Price per plate: The starting price is Rs 1000 per plate for the veg menu and Rs 1200 for the non-veg menu.

Amenities: In-house decor services, and alcohol, spacious party areas, a multi-cuisine menu, a DJ of your choice, and a bridal room.

The Maidens Crown Banquet

The Maidens Crown Banquets serves unbelievable services with all the required amenities and facilities that can add charm to this venue and can turn all your events into a starry affair. The venue is perfect to host medium-sized weddings.

Capacity: They have 3 grand event halls that can hold around 300 to 800 people at a time. Hall 1- 800 floating and 500 people seating, Hall 2-700 floating and 450 people in seating, and Hall 3- 300 people floating and 150 people in seating arrangements.

Price per plate: The price is 1450/pax which includes multi-cuisine pure vegetarian food items.

Amenities: In-house caterers, DJ, and decorators, ample parking space with free valet parking.

Raj Mahal Delux

Raj Mahal Delux is a one-stop destination for all your wedding needs which is located in Kirti Nagar. This is the perfect venue for a small or intimate wedding. Their various facilities and service can make your wedding a memorable event for you and your guests.

Capacities: Their beautiful and elegant hall can accommodate up to 60 seated guests.

Price per plate: The cost is 500/pax.

Amenities: Catering Services, valet Parking DJ, Live Band, Dance Floor, Air-Conditioned Hall, Stags Allowed, Liquor Served, basic lighting, electricity, TV Big Screen, Wi-Fi Facility, and Home Delivery.

Andaaz Banquets

The Andaaz Banquets is a few minutes’ drive away from Kirti Nagar Metro Station and Patel Nagar Railway Station. Their beautiful and elegant spacious halls can perfectly meet your varied requirements and host all types of functions.

Capacity: Their three beautifully designed halls can accommodate from 150 to 500 people at once.

Price per plate: The food cost is 1600/pax for veg. and 1700/pax for non-veg.

Amenities: In-house catering, in-house décor, ample parking space, and valet parking.

Flavours from Heaven

Flavours from Heaven is one of the luscious banquet halls in west Delhi that can arrange a lavish as well as a simple and subtle wedding. Their world-class services and modernized facilities ensure you and your guests will have an unforgettable unique experience.

Capacity: Their 3 lovely halls can easily accommodate up to 400 guests at once. Hall 1 has a capacity of 400 people and 250 in seating. Hall 2 can hold 150 people and 100 in seating while hall 3 can gather up to 100 people and 50 in seating.

Price per pate: The starting cost is 600/pax for veg and 750 for non-veg. They offer multi-cuisine food.

Amenities: In-house catering, valet parking, bridal room, power backup, and laundry service.

Symphony Banquet

Symphony Banquet is an ideal wedding venue in Delhi with beautiful Halls, high-end facilities, and amenities. They offer complete event support and make sure you will have a unique experience with them.

Capacity: Their 3 types of halls i.e., the wedding hall, party hall, and devotional prayer hall can hold around 500 people easily at a time.

Price per plate: The starting cost is 1000/pax which includes pure vegetarian food.

Amenities: various event areas, in-house catering and décor services, and bridal room.

Chandelier By Sandoz

Chandelier by Sandoz located a few distances away from Kirti Nagar Metro station is a complete package for hosting your gala affair. A beautiful mountain located in the front lobby enhances the glory of the banquets and appeals to everyone as well.

Capacity: Their various event areas can hold up to 500 guests at once from which the lower ground and ground floor has a capacity of 200, first and the second floor have a capacity of 400& 100 guests respectively.

Price per plate: 700/pax is the starting cost for veg and for non-veg its costs 800/pax.

Amenities: Electricity, basic lighting & power back-up, in-house catering, and valet parking.

The Grand Horizon Banquet

The Grand Horizon Banquet is the perfect wedding venue for organizing a grand wedding. Their well-trained experienced and dedicated staff can assist you in organizing a personalized event so that you will be able to celebrate your function in your style.

Capacity: Their spacious indoor area can accommodate 1200 guests at once.

Price per plate: The cost is 1600/pax for veg and 1800/pax or non-veg.

Amenities: Inhouse catering, décor, DJ, basic lighting and electricity backup, valet parking.

Shubh Nimantran Banquets

Shubh Nimantran Banquet is also one of the top banquets located just near to Kirti Nagar metro station. Its great ambiance, floral backdrops, and other embellished accessories can make your special day a cherished affair.

Capacity: This venue has a capacity of up to 1200 people from which 700, 500, and 500 guests can manage in floating while 280, 200, and 100 in seating.

Price per plate: approx. cost is 1100/pax for veg. and 950/pax for non-veg.

Amenities: In-house catering, DJ, parking space, and valet parking.

La Stella Banquet

La Stella with stunning interiors and great ambiance can make your big day grander and more lavish. Their top-notch quality and personalized services will let you enjoy your event stress-free.

Capacity: Their elegant hall can accommodate around 500 people floating. The whole venue has a centralized a/c, a separate dining area, and an attached dress changing room.

Price per plate: The starting price is Rs.1250.

Amenities: Spacious parking area, valet parking, bridal room, electricity, and power backup.
